website_summaries.verdict: The lack of Gigabit Ethernet in many ways cancels out the Netgear R6100's support for the fast 802.11ac standard and makes it just an average Wi-Fi router.
pros: The compact, affordable Netgear R6100 WiFi Router is easy to use and delivers good performance
cons: The new router doesn't support Gigabit Ethernet and its Wi-Fi range could be longer

customer_reviews.title: reliable for years
customer_reviews.text: It's a box that does the job. I've used it for years and it's never failed me. Can't compare it to others tho, which makes this review almost useless. If I was a geek, I'd get one of the programmable routers that can eliminate some problems and optimize speed and reliability. I did some research at the time and this seemed to be the best balance of price/performance. I typically get downloads/uploads at 10MB/S (100Mb/s). That limit is from my ISP, this unit can go faster. UPDATE 190713: There is a software update available for this unit. I've been trying to install it for two years but the update is defective and won't install. Down to 4 stars until fixed.
customer_reviews.author: swell

customer_reviews.title: Drops wireless signal frequently
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great for about 6 months, but it continually drops the wireless signal. I've done a number of trouble shooting calls with my internet provider, and the issue is with this router. I now have to restart my router 2-5 times a day to regain wireless signals. I will be buying a different router to replace this one. It is less than a year old.
customer_reviews.author: JDHilton

customer_reviews.title: Probably just a faulty/buggy one. Still annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had more trouble with a router in my life. Impossible to install without a 30 min phone call to customer service, and then decides to kick off and stop working 2 hours later. I miss my cisco.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Just spend a little more and save in the long run
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. Just as the return period of 30 days ended the router is broken. I have done everything possible to get it to work, including factory reset but it just will not cooperate. On top of it, good luck reaching support. Their online registration doesn't work for me and can't get a phone number without that to even call. Cost me an entire day. :(
customer_reviews.author: Had E.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Two minor things to consider: The lights indicating status are really, really tiny. Hard to see across a room Be sure you can actually use the 5Mhz band, if you're buying it for that feature. Only my Kindle Fire can actually detect this band, none of my laptops or Xbox can, and just use the lower frequency. So the dual band thing may not be of much use to you.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lignugaris

customer_reviews.title: The unit works great. The configuration interface seems a little odd
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a buffalo product that I had continual problems with. The unit works great. The configuration interface seems a little odd, but it will autoconfigure itself. After playing with it a bit I got it set up the way I wanted it. It is very fast despite only being 100 megabit (physical/wire speed limit). I have been quite happy with this. And it doesn't take up much space and looks pretty good sitting on a table in the family room. Would recommend to someone looking for a decent high-speed dual-band mid-range router. Works good for sd/hd streaming video.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Rock Solid
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit surprising to see quite a few negatives reviews for this router because my experience has been the opposite. I've been using it pretty heavily with both 5ghz and 2.4ghz with about 16 devices and its been absolutely rock solid. Not even once have i had to reset the router or even any wi-fi adapters, which was constant issue with my previous router and drove me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good but..
customer_reviews.text: Setup is fast and intuitive. Connection is fast as well. Three stars because I experience some problems when connecting more devices on 5GHz (two laptops, a tablet and a phone). I'm not sure but this might be due to the contemporary presence of a bluetooth signal nearby. I mean it's a good router but you could expect some minor issues once in a while and so probably there could be something comparable for less.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Schimmenti

customer_reviews.title: Piece. Of. Crap.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible router. Works for a while, then cuts out randomly. Netgear service staff are polite and well-trained but are clearly programmed to blame anything but the product. They just take up your time with repeated resets and code entries and try to convince you it's the ISP (ethernet check says otherwise), and then when you finally wind up back online (which can take hours and is probably just due to luck) they call the problem solved, but it only happens over and over again. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Functional
customer_reviews.text: 5GHz channel died after a week. A google search revealed that this is a common problem and NETGEAR is not standing behind their product. I would recommend paying less for a router without the 5GHz channel or switching to a different brand. The other channel still functions fine, but I am within the 30 day return period and am getting rid of this router.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slowed down internet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this router 5 months ago when I moved into my new house. The internet has been sub-par, disconnecting every once in a while and not supporting the speed needed to stream on my TV (both movies and live tv have been choppy). I thought the problem was with my internet, but a friend recently gave me his (used) router and now my internet speed is testing at 4-5x higher than it used to! I'm not sure if I just ended up with a lemon or if the product performance is just that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bochenek

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi Constantly Cuts Out, AVOID
customer_reviews.text: This router constantly drops from my phone and laptop. No matter what I do, the wifi drops off... on every device I've tried it with. Laptops, phones, no matter the make or model. This router is a piece of junk. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: username here

customer_reviews.title: Gotcha NetGear
customer_reviews.text: This baby fits the bill! Works great with our Motorola SURFboard EXtreme cable Modem. Wi-Fi now covers all of our home and even pushes to the outdoor spaces. With this upgraded equipment we able to get better downloads, DLNA for TV/games consoles and HD streaming to all our devices with no issues! I like having better range, simultaneous dual band and the guest network access keeps eyes off our personal equipment and systems. Quite the bang for the buck and the Amazon has it priced right too!
customer_reviews.author: Portaging

customer_reviews.title: Not so great but works now and then
customer_reviews.text: It works but kills your speed by 60% or more. I am comparing this item to Spectrum wireless which I also have. No comparison. The Netgear poops out. I will keep it for an emergency or give it to someone I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: My own

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied Give it ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ well worth the 💰💰
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Item was exactly as described and in very very good condition. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this router after having it referred to me by a friend. My old unit had a lot of connection issues and required plenty of restarting on a daily basis. After picking up the NetGear AC1200, I rarely ever restart the router and receive a very reliable wireless connection in my apartment, suitable for gaming or streaming movies on multiple systems. I would highly recommend this router based on the price and reliability!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Deuvall

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: we bought it so we could go wireless with our wifi it was a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Northrop

customer_reviews.title: Older, but still very good router
customer_reviews.text: Sure, there are newer and smaller routers available, but this one is faster than most will ever need and looks nice... It was cheap because it's older. I'm using it as a WAP and it's been very stable. The mobile app was recently updated and works well too. Fyi, I have gigabit download and 250 upload (sevice).
customer_reviews.author: Quiet7

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: The 5G network died after only 5 months. Neither Amazon or Netgear will support this product at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cureton

customer_reviews.title: Wifi doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The wifi doesn't work for me. I have tried over and over to reinstall but it never has worked
customer_reviews.author: Reenie

customer_reviews.title: Mine quit working
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a month and 1/2, After that, all of my gadgets could connect to it, but could not get internet access. I put my old access router back in service until I can find a suitable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup...Great router
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new router to support my suddenly 6x faster internet. This did not disappoint. We have gaming consoles, laptops, tablets and cellphones connected and this works perfectly. No complaints...Not at all
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Help me please
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this router but for some reason it just randomly stops working. I have to turn it off and back on at least 5 times a day. I don't know what to do to fix it. When it works it's great reception. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: Candice D

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very poor reception, slow internet, the more devices on at the same time, forget about it. No reception at the other end of the house. 1000 square foot house. I bought this to replace a old Netgear G series wireless router that worked fine till it died. I bought this AC1200 router on reputation, and reviews that were written about it.
customer_reviews.author: John Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck Chump
customer_reviews.text: It's back in the box awaiting my first chance to return it. Tried for hours to set this up and connect to internet. Never got the NewtWork Genie page to display. Tried it on two desktop computers, an IPad and 2 laptops. No success. Visited troubleshooting website and wasted hours clearing the cache, deleting files, starting and re-starting the router and modem and changing settings. A total waste of time. I'll stick with my 5 year old Cisco router.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a good Router.
customer_reviews.text: We believed that they were new, but were not. Had to return because Netgear wanted to charge for Support. Otherwise a good Router.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 6 months. I can only connect to wireless now which is not how I have my PS4 and TV connected. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: OKAY ROUTER
customer_reviews.text: Router is easy to setup using the wizard which makes it user friendly and of manual is easy to use for advance users. This router doesn't balance well so often it has to be rebooted which is a downer. - However it is compatible with other devices and newer which I like. - I am hesitant on my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Meka Reign

customer_reviews.title: hook me up
customer_reviews.text: easy upgrade for my system after loaning older setup to a close friend. I appreciate the Netgear app allowing me to check devices being used.
customer_reviews.author: tinkerman

customer_reviews.title: Great router!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I love these! Easy to set up and work great with a fantastic range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: great high end home router, good speeds both wireless and wired. USB option is a plus to connect a printer or hard drive. setup is easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: IT Manager

customer_reviews.title: Netgear
customer_reviews.text: after several months, the router seems to be working fine. My husbands computer is in another room upstairs, and his reception is excellent. Also, I've noticed that our internet streaming device for the TV's are doing great...not so much buffering as there was before.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: AC is here!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first AC WiFi purchase and even though there aren't many devices running AC yet, it's nice to plan for planned obsolescence. LOL Range is decent but not what they advertise for B/G/N. Maybe when AC devices come out, the range and speed claims will come true. All in all a great product, especially with the Genie app!
customer_reviews.author: HiFiWiFiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great, at first
customer_reviews.text: Worked for barely 6 months. Two service calls later from our ISP and they ended up declaring what I thought, the router was trash.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our Linksys router with this one and we don't even need the internet booster anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Stace Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk. All devices in my house have ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. All devices in my house have problems. Every device needs to manually disconnect and then reconnect every hour. It's because internet stops working for no reason. I'm a technology person and have nothing but problems. Can't get it working no matter what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Can handle multiple wireless!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great router! We have 2 cell phones, a pc and our TV- NO slow connections now! And when my family comes to visit a laptop and more cell phones and this router can handle it all! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: RHARHA

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BUY. VERY RELIABE ROUTER
customer_reviews.text: The Netgear AC1200 is a very reliable router. The setup is easy. I've owned the router for the past 2 months and I have not had to reboot once or lost a signal. It's an incredibly fast router. The best router for the money. I highly recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mbulu

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended by my internet provider
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a little over 6 months and have to hard reset it almost daily because my WiFi crashes. It was recommended by my internet provider, but at this point, I think my internet speed it too fast for it to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Occasionally needs rebooting, probably due to Cox Cable not ...
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally needs rebooting, probably due to Cox Cable not the router. Front is all shiny and a magnet for fingerprints. They should have left a semigloss area for picking it up and adjusting the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Stew Calkins

customer_reviews.title: an excellent product sold at a great price and delivered at ...
customer_reviews.text: As I wrote before, an excellent product sold at a great price and delivered at a right time ! Nothing else to add !!!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible!!! We had an older netgear router for years and never had a problem. Our internet provider suggested we upgrade and it has been nothing but problems! It took 3 hours to set-up taking to netgear support and we lose signal often. Terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: name

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that I get great quality at such ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for my internet. I love the fact that I get great quality at such a terrific price is such a plus.
customer_reviews.author: jackie weaver

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up for a novice and easy configuration for ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a few issues to begin with, but after a talk with a colleague and a reconfiguration, I have had little issue with it. Easy set up for a novice and easy configuration for those who know how to set up a router.
customer_reviews.author: Neal J Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Slow and the wi fi is choppy plus I'm getting kick off at times my old net gear works almost better than this one I might have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Very good speeds and consistent
customer_reviews.text: Still working after 3 years. Very good speeds and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cast

customer_reviews.title: I stream a lot of TV from the fire stick ...
customer_reviews.text: I stream a lot of TV from the fire stick and SlingTV and I cannot tell a difference between this one and my old router. I have to restart this one / reconnect a lot in order for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Estrella Durham

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 months, then died during required update
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. If there's any warranty, it's probably 3 months, so I'm outta luck.
customer_reviews.author: AsherDolph

customer_reviews.title: This is not the router you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a weaker less powerful unit but it was much worse. Would never purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: jason grote

customer_reviews.title: Replaced old router for this
customer_reviews.text: I had and older version of a Belkin router and thought is was time to upgrade to to moving into a bigger home. I get at least 3 bars throughout the whole house! I have my computer and PS3 wired but my cell phones and tablets stream perfectly with netflix. Great device to get a step up on wifi status
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ervin

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. Can't keep more than three devices on wifi stably, but it may have nothing to do with the router itself.
customer_reviews.author: superdylan

customer_reviews.title: Worked good.. but it couldn't work with mac-spent ours ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked good..but it couldn't work with mac-spent ours with all companies-no results..changed on another -all is fine..who's fault don't know
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. My lynksys wasn't through putting the speed I was getting from comcast even though it was supposed to. I don't know if was a compatibility issue with the comcast modem or what. Bought this unit and I'm getting 30Mbs+ over wireless. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Long

customer_reviews.title: I got this hoping our internet would be better between the office walls but it is not any ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping our internet would be better between the office walls but it is not any better than what we had before. Either we need a better one or get better internet speed.
customer_reviews.author: tomboys

customer_reviews.title: Weak strength
customer_reviews.text: The router did not perform as expected. The distance and strength of the wifi is barely better than the crappy router that came with the internet service. Totally disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ACTI

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This is buggy router. Don't buy. 5g signal drops. Replaced with Netgear but still sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Viraj

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Netgear's warranty is only 90 days. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware: Netgear's warranty is only 90 days. My router's ethernet connections stopped working 9 months after purchase. They wanted $79 for six months of tech support before they would let me mail it in for service. I'll never buy Netgear again.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: This product stopped working in less than two years. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working in less than two years. No explanation. I have emailed the company to see if they can provide a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Urish

customer_reviews.title: Uhmm not soo good
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it less than 24 hours and my ADT Security lost connection and I have to restart the router. I will wait one more week. If it happens again I will return this! But the speed was fast and range was good for the 2.4Ghz not so good with the 5 Ghz.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: This works great for us
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to figure out how to get this to work, but once we did, it is working perfectly. We are very happy. Great extender - reaches outside for us - which is what we wanted. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: K. P. Bos

customer_reviews.title: Get his job done!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job done for the money payed. Streaming from my iphone to my tv and streaming from my firestick m, Just Perfect!👌
customer_reviews.author: Jose de la rosa

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: I like it. good looking and work great, nothing I do not like. I would like to tell my friends about this.
customer_reviews.author: K ai

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy router to set up
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fast router. I have so many devices and don't have any issues with this router
customer_reviews.author: CWR

customer_reviews.title: Once I reset the router it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: The router works as described. Got here fast. Had to call netgear to get it setup as the instructions do not tell you any troubleshooting info. Once I reset the router it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to me by the man that fixes my computers
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by the man that fixes my computers. Seems to be working fine. No complaints no problem so far
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Barnes-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This router is easy to use and has an easy setup. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: bad wifi router
customer_reviews.text: not happy with this product. It hasn't worked well since we purchased. Don't bother
customer_reviews.author: Lori Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality wireless router. Has very good range and is easy to connect devices.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to set up. Has not given me any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade your wifi!
customer_reviews.text: Nice 2 band router, easy to set up and administer. Good range and good feature set for the average user.
customer_reviews.author: ErinTheBlack

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Have to reset it all the time. It's really annoying. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jelsson Castillo

customer_reviews.title: I thought this product would be a good choice and with it's claim of being able to ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a dual band router capable of the .11ac standard. I thought this product would be a good choice and with it's claim of being able to used throughout a large home should give me excellent coverage in my small home. Not so! Only slightly better download & uploads speeds and not any better coverage around my home. I am seriously thinking of returning this router for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: david gambini

customer_reviews.title: Misleading reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the reviews described, I can only use one wireless connection. Called support, after a hour of trying this and that I was told that the router was obviously working, because there was one wireless connection. Complete waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: shaley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ours didn't work for us and we had to return it. Maybe just a lemon but worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Compton-Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is good in terms of delivery time, product quality and cost. We liked it.
customer_reviews.author: dinesh

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from my old Router and it almost doubled my ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from my old Router and it almost doubled my MBPS speed. Should have done this long ago. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: D M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped our internet connection alot, our other router just wasnt big enough for all the devices we have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old product!
customer_reviews.text: This unit was old technology when I purchased it. Shame on me for not checking it against reviews on the internet. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tom VanGinkel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our family of computers. Everyone is able to get online at the same time and surf the web. East set up too
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the dual software firewall protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great signal strength. Fast, smooth streaming video. Removed the Netgear Genie software from my computer, it runs in the background for no apparent reason and uses resources.
customer_reviews.author: John Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Unusable!
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the back panel where your Eithernet jack is. This is the panel that allows Ethernet cords to stay plugged in. So I can't really use this...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P. Egleston

customer_reviews.title: I would like to return this
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, I have had a technican out to try install and was told that ethernet does not work. I would like to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: have had it running for a few months and its a reliable router, although there is possibly better out there for the home theatre experience this one does us fine
customer_reviews.author: ronsrn

customer_reviews.title: Good user interface
customer_reviews.text: Installed 2 weeks ago. Has not needed rebooting during that time. Good user interface.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Solly

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy impressed with it. it is more compatible with a wider range of devices than the broken one it replaced, but the connection to all those devices is not very consistent.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i would have given this more stars, if it hadn't fallen apart after a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Heymarlin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The 5G band doesn't seem to have as much range as the 2.4G band. Very nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: BinNH

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with this router
customer_reviews.text: Great router at a great price. It has a very sleek look to it, and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. The internet connection drops continuously. Now I have to use an ethernet cable. I recommend you stay away from the product...
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Dagli

customer_reviews.title: Love it helps me keep a bit of control
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great, much better than my last router. Love that I am able to control when and who can be online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: powerful with a hiccup here or there
customer_reviews.text: Works good but dont like that since ive had it its gone down and not let my internet to work even though my modem and signal were fine
customer_reviews.author: John Stinekraus

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Worst router ever! Easy setup, speeds are good and randomly reboots constantly whenever you try to use another device. Want to use 5G? Reboot after 30 seconds. Want to watch a movie on Netflix? Reboot! Using your phone as a remote for AppleTV? REBOOT! Completely useless, unreliable piece of junk. I wish I would have read more reviews about this item since a lot of people have had a similar problem and no resolution; they just have terrible stories about tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: The easiest router I have ever had to set up! Works great with NO issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gingerich

customer_reviews.title: Could not disable bridge mode.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed somewhat complex to set up (NETGEAR Genie kept coming up with unknown error after following instructions) also could not figure out how to disable bridge mode and therefore only able to connect one laptop at a time (unable to connect other devices e.g. smart TV or Apple TV or voice over ip phone etc). Router kept dropping connection (limited internet) which required me to re enter IP info and to also re validate ISP information from a browser on the connected PC. NETGEAR customer support was arduous to deal with. Purchased another brand of router which took only minutes to set up.
customer_reviews.author: JJ McC

customer_reviews.title: Easy start up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up, comes with a password protected wifi network set up. The password can be easily changed by the user after set up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna'smom

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The range is good, but not great. Be careful. If you need/want full gigabit Ethernet this is not the router for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Quality and simplicity delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this product. Great performance. Simple to use management software that even allows management from the web. Highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: mcorder76

customer_reviews.title: Since installing this router, I have had to reconnect ...
customer_reviews.text: Since installing this router, I have had to reconnect the wireless A/V equipment that use this router once or twice a week. My older N router does not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: New User

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I just got it and I have not had anymore lagging problems from Netflix. I am a happy camper lol.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Harrington

product_meta.title: NETGEAR AC1200 Dual Band Wi-Fi Router Fast Ethernet w/USB 2.0 (R6100-100PAS)
product_meta.description:
The NETGEAR R6100 Wi-Fi Router with AC1200 dual band is an incredibly fast router delivering AC1200 Wi-Fi speeds. This router offers improved performance and wireless coverage for your home. With the R6100, get 3x faster Wi-Fi speed with 11ac as compared to similar 802.11n technology. The R6100 delivers the speed and reliability needed for applications such as multiple HD streaming, online gaming and a secure and reliable connection to the Internet. The R6100 also includes NETGEAR genie home network manager for easy installation and home network management.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Dual band WiFi avoids interference for better connections
Ideal for larger homes with more WiFi devices
NETGEAR genie app provides easy installation and home management
